#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
   ll t,n,x;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
       cin>>n;
       if(n<=26)
           cout<<1;
       else
       {
           x=n/26;
           if(n%26!=0)
            cout<<x+1;
           else
            cout<<x;
       }
       cout<<'\n';
   }
   return 0;
}
